alert.note: Alert for Maricopa; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Dust Advisory issued July 22 at 7:18PM MST until July 22 at 8:15PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Dust Advisory for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... Pinal County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 815 PM MST. * At 716 PM MST, a wall of dust was along a line extending from 12 miles southwest of Chui-Chu to 10 miles south of Freeman to 6 miles west of Kaka, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Less than one miles visibility. SOURCE...Doppler radar. IMPACT...Hazardous travel. * This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 201 and 203. AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 124 and 174. AZ Route 347 between mile markers 161 and 162. Locations impacted include... Arizona City, Freeman, Big Horn, Kaka, Stanfield and East Chui-Chu. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Blowing dust brings reduced visibility, leading to dangerous driving conditions. If driving, avoid blowing dust if possible. If caught in dense blowing dust, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
